title: Instant Recall Bug
body: Curious, what did we have to do to trigger it? I've seen on YouTube, people recalled and pressed E or something using their 3rd ability...

replies.body: No need to know, it's been fixed

> [{quoted}](name=proMINscuous,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rUVtQVuV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-17T22:55:51.836+0000)
>
> No need to know, it's been fixed

I don't want to know so I can use it...I already said I'm curious of how it worked...that's why I said "What 'did' we have to do" instead of "What 'do' I do"

> [{quoted}](name=proMINscuous,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rUVtQVuV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-17T22:55:51.836+0000)
>
> No need to know, it's been fixed

it's irrelevant that it's been fixed.
